Market Outlook #61 is live:  https://t.co/TpJYrGqe06  A much briefer post this week, given the low volatility in the markets at the moment. As such, I've only covered $BTC, $ETH and $XMR, but I'll be publishing a longer, altcoin-specific post sometime next week.  Enjoy!

This Monero/ZCash vulnerability is a prime example of why wallet functionality should not be built into a full node. In this case it was exploited to deanonymise the recipient of a private transaction!   https://t.co/yox17Vpl2L
